title: What's Xayah's favorite music genre?
body:

Link to his post :

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/6EqkqYHs-whats-the-charmers-favorite-music

replies.body: Indeed I can see her listening to (E)Vastayanessence.

Rakan: Wake me up!
Xayah: Wake me up inside!
Rakan: Can't wake up!
Xayah: Wake me up inside!
Rakan: Save me!
Genders fit, but from role perspective, Xayah should be the one screaming "Save me!".
In the video the girl is falling and he shouts that so it makes no sense in the same way :P

ADC gets dove by three people under turret
Support gets attacked by dragon they accidentally aggro'd.
Support: WTF save me ADC... useless...

Rakan; SAVE MAYYY!*
There ya go bud!

> (E)Vastayanessence.

ROFL
Ima be honest, I like puns.

Same!

No problem, you deserve a bit of recognition at least lol
I upvoted all of your guys' comments in this chain but now they're all at 4 so can you please edit in a Jhin meme?

I said in this chain lol. The chain of comments that I replied in

I am a simple man 
I see Joe Bereta I upvote

I award you no points and may god have mercy on your soul.
